item.title: How to make Command Menus
item.dc:creator: @NeFiz NeFiz
item.description:
@NeFiz wrote:

in client java search for MainHelpMenu before that menu add this;

[code]
public void CommandMenu()
{

sendQuest("@bla@CommandMenu", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@red@CommandMenu start", 8145);
sendQuest("@blu@PUT COMMAND CATERGORI HERE LIKE TELEPORT COMMAND OR ITEM SPAWN COMMANDS", 8146);
sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8147);
sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8148);
sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8149);
sendQuest(“PUT COMMAND HERE “, 8150);
sendQuest(”@blu@PUT COMMAND CATERGORI HERE LIKE TELEPORT COMMAND OR ITEM SPAWN COMMANDS”, 8151);
sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8152);
sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8153);
sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8154);
sendQuest(“PUT COMMAND HERE “, 8155);
sendQuest(”@blu@PUT COMMAND CATERGORI HERE LIKE TELEPORT COMMAND OR ITEM SPAWN COMMANDS”, 8156);
sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8157);
sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8158);
sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8159);
sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8160);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();

			} [/code]

If u want to add more categori’s add this

sendQuest("@blu@PUT COMMAND CATERGORI HERE LIKE TELEPORT COMMAND OR ITEM SPAWN COMMANDS", 8156); sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8157); sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8158); sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8159); sendQuest("PUT COMMAND HERE ", 8160); after the last one but be sure that u order them in a right way from 8160-8161-8162-8163-8164 ect.

than CTRL + F search for

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mainmenu")) and right before that add

[code]
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Command”))
{

CommandMenu();
}[/code]

compile and ur done

Read full topic
